message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations.

Alice, your product is appealing, but I'm looking for a more competitive price. Given my budget and the value I see in the product, I'm willing to offer $850,000. I believe this represents a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration of your proposal, I am pleased to offer you the product at a price of $900,000. This reflects a compromise between our initial offers, aiming to provide value to you while ensuring a reasonable return for us. I hope this proposal aligns better with your financial considerations.
